articles.title: Updating your AirPods will be essential if you own an iPhone, a MacBook or iPad - Express.co.uk
articles.description: APPLE fans were treated to a bundle of new features for AirPods and AirPods Pro during the WWDC keynote presentation. Here's everything you need to know about the latest treats coming to your Bluetooth earbuds.
articles.content: With Automatic Switching, AirPods will automatically switch between those Apple devices as you switch between them. For example, if you finish a phone call on your iPhone and pick up your iPad to wat… [+814 chars]
